General.Name: Career Point Limited
General.Description: Career Point Limited, an education company, provides education consultancy, management, tutorial, and residential hostel services in India. It offers tutorial services to students for school curriculum and various competitive examinations in the areas of engineering and medical entrance, NTSE, KVPY, and Science Olympiad. The company provides its tutorial services through various delivery platforms, including owned branches, franchisee training centers, online courses, school integrated programs, and distance learning solutions. It also offers education consultancy and management services for the administration of schools; infrastructural and financial services to higher education institutions, such as colleges and universities; and online platforms and technology-based learning solutions. In addition, the company operates Career Point Gurukul, a residential integrated school campus, including infrastructure and modern facilities, such as school, hostel, food court, staff residence, guest house, play ground, shopping complex, and various recreational services at one place; Career Point University, a higher education institution; Global Public School; Global Kids, a pre-school and K12; and Career Point Institute of Skill Development that provides employability skills aligned to industry needs. Further, it offers residential hostel services and leasing; and educational and non- educational loans. The company was formerly known as Career Point Infosystems Limited and changed its name to Career Point Limited in September 2011. Career Point Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Kota, India.

2.Name: Mr. Tarun Kumar Jain
2.Title: Chief Investor Relations Officer and GM of Corp. & Legal Affairs
